testcase.classname: E2E - Order placement from company app
testcase.name: End to End - Creating a order, approving

page.....................................passed When I click new order button...............................................passed Then I am on orders page....................................................passed And I choose location.......................................................passed And I fill all fields with valid I make click in the button create job to access to start to create the job.passed And In the detail of the job created, I am starting to set the title and the specials date and times for auto
